title: Fortune Arterial
alternative_title: Fortune Arterial: Akai Yakusoku, FORTUNE ARTERIAL 赤い約束
description: After a childhood full of school transfers, Hasekura Kouhei’s parents finally send him to a traditionally-Christian boarding school so he won’t have to move with them. Finally free to have the calm and uninterrupted school life he’s always wanted, he instead find himself busy with a swarm of idiosyncratic friends.
